properties.shortDescription: 3-bed family home near Petts Wood station with conservatory and utility room.
properties.longDescription: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises two receptions, fitted kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior.
properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior...
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.shortDescription: Modern 2-bed garden flat with open-plan living and private courtyard.
properties.longDescription: Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat. The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances. Bi-fold doors lead to a secluded private courtyard garden.
properties.description: Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat. The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden.

properties.shortDescription: Contemporary 1-bed apartment near Liverpool Street with quiet courtyard views.
properties.longDescription: Smart, contemporary one-bedroom apartment with great connectivity and quiet courtyard views. Ideal for professionals, with easy access to transport links, cafes and city amenities.
properties.description: Smart, contemporary one-bedroom apartment with great connectivity and quiet courtyard views — ideal for professionals.

properties.shortDescription: Spacious 4-bed Victorian terrace near Regent’s Park with modern kitchen and garden.
properties.longDescription: Spacious Victorian terrace with high ceilings, private garden and modern kitchen. Close to Regent's Park and local amenities, with excellent transport connections.
properties.description: Spacious Victorian terrace with high ceilings, private garden and modern kitchen. Close to Regent's Park and local amenities.

properties.shortDescription: 3-bed riverside flat with panoramic views, open-plan living, and secure parking.
properties.longDescription: Well-appointed riverside flat offering panoramic views, open-plan kitchen/living area and secure parking. Ideal for commuters with quick access into central London.
properties.description: Well-appointed riverside flat offering panoramic views, open-plan kitchen/living area and secure parking. Ideal for commuters.

properties.shortDescription: Charming 3-bed period home in Marylebone with private courtyard and great transport.
properties.longDescription: Charming period property offering three bedrooms, a private courtyard and easy access to central London shops and transit. A great choice for families and professionals alike.
properties.description: Charming period property offering three bedrooms, a private courtyard and easy access to central London shops and transit.

properties.shortDescription: Bright 2-bed flat in Chelsea with open-plan living and modern finishes.
properties.longDescription: Light-filled two-bedroom flat with open-plan living area and contemporary bathroom. Moments from amenities and transport, ideal for city living.
properties.description: Light-filled two-bedroom flat with open-plan living area and contemporary bathroom. Moments from amenities and transport.
